alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 6:26AM MST until February 22 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet. * WHERE...Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs and Central Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 11 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected. Traction laws may be enacted.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs
